title: US Judge Backs SEC: Trading of Certain Cryptocurrencies on Secondary Markets Are Securities Transactions
description: A U.S. district judge has sided with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in a ruling that declares the trading of certain crypto assets on secondary markets to be securities transactions. This decision emerged from an insider trading case involving crypto exchange Coinbase’s former product manager Ishan Wahi, his brother Nikhil Wahi, and their friend […]

description: In a move set to transform the landscape of knowledge base creation in the IT support realm, InvGate, a renowned Buenos Aires-based company, has introduced its groundbreaking AI Hub. This innovative tool aims to revolutionize the way companies handle incident response conversations by automatically generating knowledge articles. This breakthrough not only promises efficiency gains but […]

title: AI Tools Pose Threat with Misleading Election Images, Researchers Warn
description: AI tools for image creation have emerged as a potential avenue for spreading misleading information related to elections, despite the efforts of companies like OpenAI and Microsoft to combat misinformation. Researchers at the Centre for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH) revealed in a recent report the alarming potential of these tools to generate deceptive images, raising […]
